patthana15.32:4.1: Noāsavaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noāsavo nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.32:5.1: Āsavaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noāsavo naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
patthana15.32:6.1: Noāsavaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nanoāsavo naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
